title: Chevron
summary: "The Chevron is a workhorse warship that makes up for its lack in agility with strength and stubbornness."
full_text:
Chevron
"The Chevron is a workhorse warship that makes up for its lack in agility with strength and stubbornness."
The Chevron is a corvette-class ship of the Legionis ship line. It is best suited as a sturdy fleet ship.
Advantages
The Chevron is the most durable corvette in the game, making it good for NPC hunting, as it can sustain a good amount of damage before retreating. In addition, it is the only corvette capable of unleashing a full broadside, meaning it has 360 degrees of possible attack vectors horizontally. As corvettes are faster than other warships, it is still faster than large ships, despite being a slow corvette. As a new player, this is a solid choice for a combat corvette.
Disadvantages
The Chevron is clunky and slow compared to other corvettes, meaning that in a 1 on 1 engagement, it can be outmaneuvered and kited if a pilot is not careful. In addition, while its broadside capabilities horizontally are well-off, vertically its turret placement suffers heavily.
Because of it's high hull and low shield, it is vulnerable to kinetic weaponry, and in PvP, it has less opportunity to retreat into a station (as ships are blocked from entering stations if they run out of shield)
Trivia
- The current Chevron is modeled by ii_Cove and Axaraz.
- The Chevron was formerly named the Dolphin due to the fin on its Pre-Next Gen model.
